dct_description_sm: Shirkat-i Gita Shinasi. Translation of title: Map showing spread of Islam in the world. Insets: Religions of the world, and the spread of Islam during its first century. Shows flags and gives statistics for countries with an Islamic population of more than 6 percent. Map no. 157.
